about_the_game:
Cobbled Quest is a third-person action game where you take on the role of a hero on a mission to assemble a team of trapped warriors across diverse worlds. Explore, battle, and strategize as you uncover the potential of this evolving adventure.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Combat and Unique Weapons: Equip a variety of rifles, each with distinct attack styles and special skills. Defeat powerful bosses to add their dropped weapons to your inventory. Weapon skills consume souls, which are collected from defeated enemies.

  • Strategic Item Collection: Discover items throughout the world that can enhance your abilities or influence gameplay for both you and your enemies, encouraging creative strategies.

  • Team-Building Gameplay: Rescue warriors trapped in different worlds. Once freed, they join your team to help defend the ancient stone from waves of enemies.

  • Challenging Boss Fights: Face off against unique bosses, each with its own mechanics and challenges, offering varied combat scenarios.

  • Wave Defence Mode: After assembling your team of warriors, defend the ancient stone together in intense enemy wave battles that blend action and strategy.

  • Diverse Environments: Explore multiple worlds, each with its own theme, atmosphere, and challenges, as you progress through the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7, AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
